title: Comedian Joel McHale Talks Dyslexia, Bad TV And Filming A Thriller
teaser: The host of The Soup co-stars in the thriller Deliver Us From Evil. "I felt like a 12-year-old getting to be in an action film," McHale tells Terry Gross. Originally broadcast June 30, 2014.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
